license_motion_raw_capture_April2020 module¶

license_motion_raw_capture_April2020.detect_license_plate()[source]¶

This function includes the detection of the license plate.

Credits go to OpenAlpr.

The return values are the 3 strings plate, confidence and date. These 3 strings are saved in the MySQL database ‘plates’, in the host=’localhost’, port=’3306’.

license_motion_raw_capture_April2020.get_stream_from_localhost()[source]¶

The get_stream_from_localhost() function gets the bytes from the stream generated by the Motion-project.

license_motion_raw_capture_April2020.main()[source]¶

The main() function organizes all the other functions in the correct execution order and measures the time elapsed by the image creation and the image processing.

license_motion_raw_capture_April2020.print_stream_variables(passed_list)[source]¶

The function gets the detection variables from the stream so they image can be decoded.
